name: Opslane
long_description:
Opslane reduces the alert fatigue that overwhelms on-call engineers and leads to millions in lost productivity and downtime. 

We add critical business, customer, and revenue impact to alerts, enabling teams to quickly identify and resolve the most impactful issues.

Are noisy alerts a hair on fire problem for your company, or someone you know? We'd love to hear from you - email founders@opslane.com.
one_liner: Open-source tool to reduce noisy alerts
